Higher wholesale costs push up default and pre-payment price caps from April

From 1 April, the levels of the default tariff and pre-payment meter price cap will increase to reflect higher costs.

Ofgem has appointed Utilita Energy Limited to take on supplying Our Power’s 31,000 domestic customers
